announcement Struct Reference
Announcements

Representation of an announcement. More...

#include </cygdrive/e/share/contiki/core/net/rime/announcement.h>

Detailed Description

Representation of an announcement.

This structure holds the state of an announcement. It is an opaque structure with no user-visible elements.

Examples:

example-announcement.c, and example-multihop.c.
